name: Battle of Battles
description:
Only the fierce ones 

shall receive the crown!

_________________________________________________________________________________

For best experience play with controller and download windows version!
_______________________________________________________________________________


This game was made for the #mizJam1!  in 48 hours.

Everyone participated used the same art kit from Kenney! https://kenney.nl/

Music and sound effects  are public domain from some very generous people!

Thank you very much!

Alternative controls for Keyboard

J K L ( red,blue,dash)
